item.description: http://www.facebook.c... Please join us at McFadden's on Tuesday, November 15 to watch the tenth GOP primary debate of the presidential cycle. The debate being hosted by CNN, American Enterprise Institute, and the Heritage Foundation and will take place in Washington, DC. The debate starts at 8PM EST. We have the back room reserved from 7:30-10:30. Some things to keep in mind: -No under 21 "admitted" (supposedly[?]) pm shem for details -$3 off discount parking available around the corner at the 75 State Street Garage
item.name: Boston Debate-Watching Party
